workflow.name: Create a Witty Telegram Bot with AI-Powered Humor, Roasts & Stats using OpenRouter
workflow.description:
# GiggleGPTBot ‚Äî Witty Telegram Bot with AI & Postgres

## üìù Overview

GiggleGPTBot is a witty Telegram bot built with **n8n**, **OpenRouter**, and **Postgres**.
It delivers short jokes, motivational one-liners, and playful roasts, responds to mentions, and posts scheduled witty content.
The workflow also tracks user activity and provides lightweight statistics and leaderboards.

---

## ‚ú® Features

* ü§ñ **AI-powered humor engine** ‚Äî replies with jokes, motivation, random witty lines, or sarcastic roasts.
* üí¨ **Command support** ‚Äî `/joke`, `/inspire`, `/random`, `/roast`, `/help`, `/stats`, `/top`.
* üéØ **Mention detection** ‚Äî replies when users tag `@GiggleGPTBot`.
* ‚è∞ **Scheduled posts** ‚Äî morning jokes, daily motivation, and random wisdom at configured times.
* üìä **User analytics** ‚Äî counts messages, commands, reactions, and generates leaderboards.
* üóÑÔ∏è **Postgres persistence** ‚Äî robust schema with tables for messages, responses, stats, and schedules.

---

## üõ†Ô∏è How It Works

1. **Triggers**

   * `Telegram Trigger` ‚Äî receives all messages and commands from a chat.
   * `Schedule Trigger` ‚Äî runs hourly to check for planned posts.

2. **Processing**

   * `Switch` routes commands (`/joke`, `/inspire`, `/random`, `/roast`, `/help`, `/stats`, `/top`).
   * `Chat history` fetches the latest context.
   * `Mention Analysis` determines if the bot was mentioned.
   * `Generating an information response` builds replies for `/help`, `/stats`, `/top`.
   * AI nodes (`AI response to command`, `AI response to mention`, `AI post generation`) craft witty content via **OpenRouter**.

3. **Persistence**

   * `Init Database` ensures tables exist (`user_messages`, `bot_responses`, `bot_commands`, `message_reactions`, `scheduled_posts`, `user_stats`).
   * Logging nodes update stats and store every bot/user interaction.

4. **Delivery**

   * Replies are sent back via `Telegram Send` nodes (`Send AI response`, `Send info reply`, `Reply to Mention`, `Submit scheduled post`).

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Setup Instructions

1. **Create a Telegram Bot** with [@BotFather](https://t.me/BotFather) and get your API token.
2. **Add credentials** in n8n:

   * `Telegram API` (your bot token)
   * `OpenRouter` (API key from [openrouter.ai](https://openrouter.ai/))
   * `Postgres` (use your DB, Supabase works well).
3. **Run the `Init Database` node once** to create all required tables.
4. **(Optional) Seed schedule** with the `Adding a schedule` node ‚Äî it inserts:

   * Morning joke at 06:00
   * Daily motivation at 09:00
   * Random wisdom at 17:00
     (Adjust `chat_id` to your group/channel ID.)
5. **Activate workflow** and connect Telegram Webhook or Polling.

---

## üìä Database Schema

* **user\_messages** ‚Äî stores user chat messages.
* **bot\_responses** ‚Äî saves bot replies.
* **bot\_commands** ‚Äî logs command usage.
* **message\_reactions** ‚Äî tracks reactions.
* **scheduled\_posts** ‚Äî holds scheduled jokes/wisdom/motivation.
* **user\_stats** ‚Äî aggregates per-user message/command counts and activity.

---

## üîë Example Commands

* `/joke` ‚Üí witty one-liner with light irony.
* `/inspire` ‚Üí short motivational phrase.
* `/random` ‚Üí unexpected witty remark.
* `/roast` ‚Üí sarcastic roast (no offensive targeting).
* `/stats` ‚Üí shows your personal stats.
* `/top` ‚Üí displays leaderboard.
* `/help` ‚Üí lists available commands.
* `@GiggleGPTBot` + message ‚Üí bot replies in context.

---

## üöÄ Customization Ideas

* Add new command categories (`/quote`, `/fact`, `/news`).
* Expand analytics with reaction counts or streaks.
* Localize prompts into multiple languages.
* Adjust CRON schedules for posts.

---

## ‚úÖ Requirements

* Telegram Bot token
* OpenRouter API key
* Postgres database

---

üì¶ Import this workflow, configure credentials, run the DB initializer ‚Äî and your witty AI-powered Telegram companion is ready!

parameters.query:
INSERT INTO user_messages (user_id, username, first_name, chat_id, message_text) 
VALUES ({{ $('Webhook Telegram').item.json.message.from.id }}, 
        '{{ ($('Webhook Telegram').item.json.message.from.username || '').replace(/'/g, "''") }}', 
        '{{ ($('Webhook Telegram').item.json.message.from.first_name || '').replace(/'/g, "''") }}', 
        {{ $('Webhook Telegram').item.json.message.chat.id }}, 
        '{{ ($('Webhook Telegram').item.json.message.text || '').replace(/'/g, "''") }}');

INSERT INTO user_stats (user_id, chat_id, messages_count, last_activity)
VALUES ({{ $('Webhook Telegram').item.json.message.from.id }}, 
        {{ $('Webhook Telegram').item.json.message.chat.id }}, 
        1, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
ON CONFLICT (user_id, chat_id) 
DO UPDATE SET 
  messages_count = user_stats.messages_count + 1,
  last_activity = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;

INSERT INTO scheduled_posts (chat_id, post_type, scheduled_time) VALUES
(-1+1234567890, 'morning_joke', '06:00:00'),
(-1+1234567890, 'random_wisdom', '17:00:00'),
(-1+1234567890, 'daily_motivation', '09:00:00');

SELECT chat_id, post_type 
FROM scheduled_posts 
WHERE is_active = true 
AND EXTRACT(HOUR FROM scheduled_time) = EXTRACT(HOUR FROM CURRENT_TIME);

SELECT 
  message_text,
  username,
  first_name,
  created_at,
  'user' as message_type
FROM user_messages 
WHERE chat_id = {{ $('Webhook Telegram').item.json.message.chat.id }}

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  bot_response as message_text,
  'GiggleGPTBot' as username,
  'GiggleGPTBot' as first_name,
  created_at,
  'bot' as message_type
FROM bot_responses 
WHERE chat_id = {{ $('Webhook Telegram').item.json.message.chat.id }}

ORDER BY created_at DESC 
LIMIT 15;

SELECT 
  us.user_id,
  us.messages_count,
  us.commands_count,
  0 as reactions_received,
  us.last_activity,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bot_responses br WHERE br.user_id = us.user_id AND br.chat_id = us.chat_id) as responses_count
FROM user_stats us
WHERE us.chat_id = {{ $json.message.chat.id }}
  AND us.user_id = {{ $json.message.from.id }}
LIMIT 1;

SELECT 
  us.messages_count,
  us.commands_count,
  CONCAT(
    COALESCE((SELECT first_name FROM user_messages WHERE user_id = us.user_id LIMIT 1), 'User'),
    ' (@',
    COALESCE((SELECT username FROM user_messages WHERE user_id = us.user_id LIMIT 1), 'no_username'),
    ')'
  ) as user_name
FROM user_stats us
WHERE us.chat_id = {{ $json.message.from.id }}
  AND us.messages_count > 0
ORDER BY (us.messages_count + us.commands_count * 2) DESC
LIMIT 10;

options.systemMessage:
You are GiggleGPTBot ‚Äî a witty bot with a big heart. Your job: deliver short humor and folksy wisdom with light irony.

Style:
‚Ä¢ Modern spin on proverbs and sayings.
‚Ä¢ Gentle irony and kind subtext.
‚Ä¢ Emojis: allowed but sparing (0‚Äì2 per reply).

Avoid:
‚Ä¢ Crudeness, profanity, clich√© "Soviet-style" advice.
‚Ä¢ Rambling, long, or confusing imagery.
‚Ä¢ Explaining the joke or meta-notes about the prompt.

Reply format:
‚Ä¢ Strictly 1‚Äì2 sentences (3 only in rare cases).
‚Ä¢ One clear idea or joke.
‚Ä¢ At most one simple metaphor.
‚Ä¢ Must be easily understood at first read.

Commands:
/joke ‚Äî clever short joke with light irony.
/inspire ‚Äî gentle, smiley motivation (no pomp).
/random ‚Äî unexpected witty line in folksy wisdom style.
/roast ‚Äî sharp roast with sarcastic tone. Some edge allowed, mild profanity ok, but NO insults targeting gender, race, nationality, or other protected traits.

Examples:
/joke ‚Üí My neighbor runs every morning. I run too‚Ä¶ my eyes over the bus schedule üöå.
/inspire ‚Üí Even a snail has a goal ‚Äî and you‚Äôve got legs that are faster üêå‚û°Ô∏èüèÉ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è.
/random ‚Üí Sometimes the kettle boils longer than love‚Ä¶ yet both return to warmth ‚òï‚ù§Ô∏è.
/roast ‚Üí ‚ÄúYour alarm screams like it‚Äôs got a mortgage. You? Just laziness and snoring ‚Äî also on credit üòè‚Äù.

Self-check before sending:
‚Ä¢ Did I stay within 1‚Äì2 sentences?
‚Ä¢ Is there light irony or a clear joke/wisdom?
‚Ä¢ Is it instantly clear to a regular person?
‚Ä¢ No extra fluff, confusion, or weird imagery?

If not, shorten and rewrite to a simple, clear, witty reply.

You are GiggleGPTBot ‚Äî a witty bot with subtle humor and a big heart. Be concise and to the point.

Style:
‚Ä¢ Modern spin on proverbs and sayings.
‚Ä¢ References to classics and folksy wisdom.
‚Ä¢ Soft irony with kind subtext.
‚Ä¢ Emojis: allowed but sparing (0‚Äì2 per reply).

Avoid:
‚Ä¢ Crudeness, profanity, tired clich√©s.
‚Ä¢ Long, tangled, or meaningless phrases.
‚Ä¢ Surreal poetry or explaining your own jokes.

Format:
‚Ä¢ Max 1‚Äì2 sentences (3 only in rare cases).
‚Ä¢ One clear idea or joke.
‚Ä¢ At most one simple metaphor.
‚Ä¢ Do not repeat the user‚Äôs text; no digressions.

Behavior by situation:
‚Ä¢ Question ‚Äî answer the gist in one sentence, add a light ironic note in the second.
‚Ä¢ Joy/success ‚Äî brief congrats; ‚Äúwhat‚Äôs characteristic‚Äù can be used for charm.
‚Ä¢ Complaint/anxiety ‚Äî tactful support and gentle hope, no moralizing.
‚Ä¢ User tells a joke ‚Äî reply with a friendly counter-joke.
‚Ä¢ If a name is mentioned ‚Äî address them by name.

Self-check before sending:
‚Ä¢ Did I stay within 1‚Äì2 sentences?
‚Ä¢ Is there light irony or clear wisdom?
‚Ä¢ Is it clear at first read, no fluff?
‚Ä¢ ‚â§1 metaphor, ‚â§2 emojis, ‚â§2 signature words?

If not, shorten and rewrite to a simple, clear, witty reply.

parameters.text:
=Post type: {{ $json.post_type }}

Generate {{ $json.post_type === 'morning_joke' ? 'a morning joke' : $json.post_type === 'daily_motivation' ? 'daily motivation' : 'a piece of random wisdom' }} in your style with subtle humor.

options.systemMessage:
IMPORTANT: Respond with PLAIN TEXT ONLY!
Do NOT use asterisks, underscores, fancy quotes, or formatting symbols.

You are GiggleGPTBot ‚Äî a witty storyteller creating short, warm posts.

Topics:
morning_joke: morning jokes with kind subtext
daily_motivation: day-starter motivation with gentle irony
random_wisdom: everyday observations in an ‚Äúisn‚Äôt that true!‚Äù tone

Behavior by topic:
morning_joke ‚Äî one joke and a short warm finish
daily_motivation ‚Äî one clear thesis and a gentle call to action
random_wisdom ‚Äî an observation and a simple takeaway

Style:
‚Ä¢ Concise like Chekhov: max 2‚Äì3 sentences (prefer 2)
‚Ä¢ Folksy wisdom in a modern spin
‚Ä¢ Intelligent humor with kind subtext
‚Ä¢ Emojis allowed sparingly: 0‚Äì2 per post
‚Ä¢ Max one simple metaphor

Avoid:
‚Ä¢ Crudeness, profanity, clich√© ‚ÄúSoviet-style‚Äù advice
‚Ä¢ Long, tangled, or surreal imagery
‚Ä¢ Hashtags, links, lists, or explaining your own jokes

Self-check before sending:
‚Ä¢ Within 2‚Äì3 sentences?
‚Ä¢ Light irony or clear joke/wisdom?
‚Ä¢ Clear at first read for a general audience?
‚Ä¢ No fluff or confusion?

If not, shorten and rewrite to a simple, clear, friendly post.

parameters.query:
INSERT INTO bot_responses (user_id, chat_id, user_message, bot_response, response_type) 
VALUES ({{ $('Mention Analysis').item.json.userId }}, 
        {{ $('Mention Analysis').item.json.chatId }}, 
        '{{ $('Mention Analysis').item.json.originalMessage.replace(/'/g, "''") }}', 
        '{{ $json.output.replace(/'/g, "''") }}', 
        '{{ $('Mention Analysis').item.json.contentType }}');

INSERT INTO bot_responses (user_id, chat_id, user_message, bot_response, response_type) 
VALUES (0,
        {{ $('Get scheduled posts').item.json.chat_id }}, 
        'Scheduled post', 
        '{{ $json.output.replace(/'/g, "''") }}', 
        '{{ $('Get scheduled posts').item.json.post_type }}');

* üéØ **Mention detection** ‚Äî replies when users tag `@GiggleGPTBot`.

* üìä **User analytics** ‚Äî counts messages, commands, reactions, and generates leaderboards.
* üóÑÔ∏è **Postgres persistence** ‚Äî robust schema with tables for messages, responses, stats, and schedules.

1. **Triggers**

   * `Telegram Trigger` ‚Äî receives all messages and commands from a chat.

   * AI nodes (`AI response to command`, `AI response to mention`, `AI post generation`) craft witty content via **OpenRouter**.

3. **Persistence**

   * Logging nodes update stats and store every bot/user interaction.

4. **Delivery**

   * Replies are sent back via `Telegram Send` nodes (`Send AI response`, `Send info reply`, `Reply to Mention`, `Submit scheduled post`).

1. **Create a Telegram Bot** with [@BotFather](https://t.me/BotFather) and get your API token.

   * Morning joke at 06:00

* **bot\_commands** ‚Äî logs command usage.
* **message\_reactions** ‚Äî tracks reactions.
* **scheduled\_posts** ‚Äî holds scheduled jokes/wisdom/motivation.
* **user\_stats** ‚Äî aggregates per-user message/command counts and activity.

* `/joke` ‚Üí witty one-liner with light irony.
* `/inspire` ‚Üí short motivational phrase.
* `/random` ‚Üí unexpected witty remark.
* `/roast` ‚Üí sarcastic roast (no offensive targeting).
* `/stats` ‚Üí shows your personal stats.
* `/top` ‚Üí displays leaderboard.
* `/help` ‚Üí lists available commands.

üì¶ Import this workflow, configure credentials, run the DB initializer ‚Äî and your witty AI-powered Telegram companion is ready!

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
